skill.name: Splash
skill.desc: The monster just flops and splashes around to no effect at all

skill.name: Tackle
skill.desc: A physical attack in which the monster charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

skill.name: Lick
skill.desc: The foe is licked and hit with a long tongue

skill.name: Harden
skill.desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.
